## ğŸš€ How to Sponsor

## ğŸ“‹ Rules & Guidelines

### âœ… Included
- Public recognition (unless anonymous)
- Priority support based on tier
- Influence on project direction
- Direct maintainer access
- Early feature previews

### âŒ Not Included
- Guaranteed features (except Platinum)
- Private software versions
- Feature restriction rights
- Project control
- Legal liability

### ğŸ”’ Privacy
- Anonymous sponsorship available
- We never share or sell sponsor data
- GitHub Sponsors handles all payments
- Sponsor information shared only with permission

### ğŸ“œ Terms
- Monthly billing cycle
- Cancel anytime, no commitment
- Benefits remain until billing period ends
- Recognition removed 30 days after cancellation
- No refunds for partial months
